mapper.insert: INSERT INTO aps_immediately_inventory (f_material_id, f_stock_name, f_base_qty, f_avb_qty, f_lot, f_expiry_date, version) SELECT f_material_id, f_stock_name, f_base_qty, f_avb_qty, f_lot, f_expiry_date, version + 1 FROM `aps_immediately_inventory` WHERE version = ( SELECT max(version) FROM aps_immediately_inventory)
